sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:entrezGene:
HDAC8
(a.k.a. CDA07, CDLS5, HD8, HDACL1, KDAC8, MRXS6, RPD3, WTS)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T7 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for bacteriophage T7 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T7 promoter

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Binding of the Microbial Cyclic Tetrapeptide Trapoxin A to the Class I Histone Deacetylase HDAC8. Porter NJ, Christianson DW. ACS Chem Biol. 2017 Sep 15;12(9):2281-2286. doi: 10.1021/acschembio.7b00330. Epub 2017 Aug 30. 10.1021/acschembio.7b00330 PubMed 28846375

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: basis of mobility region from pBR322
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: bom
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: bom

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagsFusionProteins: hexahistidine tag (N terminal on backbone) tobacco etch virus protease cleavage site (N terminal on backbone)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lacI
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lacI
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T7 terminator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: transcription terminator for bacteriophage T7 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T7 terminator

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Expresses a truncated construct of histone deacetylase 8 for crystallography bearing an N-terminal tobacco etch virus protease-cleavable hexahistidine-maltose binding protein tag

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: KanR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to kanamycin in bacteria or G418 (Geneticin(R)) in eukaryotes
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: KanR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:mutation: Residues Met1–Pro7 and H375-V377 have been deleted relative to wild-type histone deacetylase 8

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: efficient ribosome binding site from bacteriophage T7 gene 10 (Olins and Rangwala, 1989)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: efficient ribosome binding site from bacteriophage T7 gene 10 (Olins and Rangwala, 1989)
pBR322 vectors, tet region, downstream of BamHI, reverse primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBRrevBam
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBRrevBam

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: TEV site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: TEV site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: tobacco etch virus (TEV) protease recognition and cleavage site

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Expresses a truncated construct of histone deacetylase 8 for crystallography bearing an N-terminal tobacco etch virus protease-cleavable hexahistidine-maltose binding protein tag.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:vectorBackbone: pET His6 MBP TEV LIC cloning vector

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: rop
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Rop protein, which maintains plasmids at low copy number
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: rop

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pRS-marker

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: This version of the gene does not encode a signal sequence, so MBP will remain in the cytosol.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: maltose binding protein from E. coli
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: MBP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: MBP

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pET His6 MBP TEV HDAC8_374 was a gift from David Christianson (Addgene plasmid # 122174 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:122174 ; RRID:Addgene_122174)
